text:
Palo Alto Software - Eugene, OR - Full-time, ONSITE

We are hiring front-end and devops positions to work on LivePlan, a rapidly-growing business planning application for small and medium businesses.

React, Flux, Java, AWS, lots of other cool stuff. Good environment, good people, and it's not the Bay Area so that's like an automatic 1.5x multiplier to the salary right off the bat.

Just because it's hard to search for "OR" sometimes I'm going to specifically spell out "Oregon".

We're using React/Flux on the front end, Java on the back end. Lots of cool problems to solve in the coming months.

Craigslist ads: http://eugene.craigslist.org/sof/5080695549.html http://eugene.craigslist.org/sof/5080703611.html

You can email me, evan at paloalto dot com, with any questions.
